coza.opencollab.synthesis.service.content.impl

Class AsyncContentLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • coza.opencollab.synthesis.service.api.creator.impl.AbstractLoader
      • coza.opencollab.synthesis.service.content.impl.AsyncContentLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContentLoader

    public class AsyncContentLoader
extends AbstractLoader
implements ContentLoader
    This is a asynchronous implementation of the ContentLoader.

    This class will; - check the repository from time to time for new data - retrieve the content and register the new version - deactivate the old - work out the synchronize data

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.1
    Author:
    OpenCollab
